title: Pixel 4 is Randomly Rebooting
content:
I just got my Pixel 4 yesterday, and it was working great after importing all my data from my old phone (Original Pixel). But today I've been experiencing the following issues regularly:

The phone will randomly reboot
Certain apps will stop working, and will sometimes crash when opened. This can also occasionally cause the phone to reboot
The phone will also sometimes get caught in a boot loop, where it restarts over and over and the only way to stop it is to force a restart by holding down the power button.

There is a security update available, but whenever I try to do it I get an "Installation Failed" error.
I have tried the following solutions:

Restarting in safe mode and trying the security update (update still fails)
Resetting the phone to factory defaults (update still fails)
Resetting the phone and not importing data from the old phone (Adding everything again manually)
Ensuring that all apps are up to date

I am not sure what else can be done apart from getting a replacement.
